review: Was so excited about this! This should be free to Amazon prime members. It doesn't have that much stuff on there. Only movies that are free are the prime even though half the other movies are really old you have to pay for them. Also if I leave it plugged in and try to watch regular TV it blacks out. I have to unplug it every time I want to watch regular TV!
author: Julie
